name: Hook Cat
description:
Description

The game is about a pirate cat who is on a long search for a precious treasure. However, he is shipwrecked and finds himself on an island. 

When he wakes up, he sees the shape of some of the island's natives stealing the ship's parts. His goal is to find them on the mysterious island to repair his ship and continue his journey. 

But it is harder for him to find his way on this island than he thought and there are many abysses in his way that he cannot cross without further help.

 For this reason, he builds an apparatus out of a cannon and a “fishbone” grappling hook, which should help him in locomotion and battle.

Can you help the cat find the ship parts?

Controls:

WASD - Walk

Mouse -  Aim with the hook

Left Mousebutton -  Shoot at trees, rocks or enemies

If the hook is attached to the enemy you can jump with the direction pointing to the platform and release the hook with the Right Mouse button or the   directional button opposite to the platform

Goal: 

Collect the 5 ship pieces and find the 3 secrets
